name: 漢語實驗語音學
description: 訓練以系統性﹑一致性的方法來描述與記錄語音，學習如何使用聲譜儀及其與發音部位和方法的聯繫及找出華語學習者語音困難所在及其因應對策。
goals: 如何描述外國學生的發音
如何從事漢語語音學的研究
華語語音教學的相關應用
syllabus:
主題內容

備 註

1

The Study of Phonetics and its Main Branches

語音學的研究範圍﹑主要分支研究的名稱及內容

2

Definition of Terminology in Phonetics

語音學術語的中﹑英文名稱及定義

3

Theories and Research Methods in Phonetics Studies

語音學研究的理論和方法

4

IPA Transcription and Mandarin Pronunciation

國際音標記音與華語發音

5

Consonants of Mandarin Chinese and their Interlanguage Variants

漢語的輔音/二語者的輔音

6

Vowels of Mandarin Chinese and their Interlanguage Variants

漢語的元音/二語者的元音

7

Syllables and Syllable Structures of Mandarin Chinese and their Interlanguage Variants

漢語的音節與音節結構/二語者的音節結構

8

Tones of Mandarin Chinese and their Interlanguage Variants

漢語的聲調/二語者的聲調

9

Assimilations, Dissimilations, Tone Sandhi, and Er-suffixation of Mandarin Chinese and their Interlanguage Variants

漢語的音變（同化﹑異化﹑變調﹑兒化韻）/二語者的音變

10

Neutral Tones and Intonation of Mandarin Chinese and their Interlanguage Variants

漢語的輕聲和語調/二語者的輕聲和語調

11

Phonemes and Distinctive Features of Mandarin Chinese and their Interlanguage Variants

漢語的音位和區別特徵/二語者的音系

12

Pedagogical Applications of Mandarin Experimental Phonetics Research into Teaching Chinese as a Second Language

華語實驗語音研究之華語教學應用
